text: "Tainted Love" is a pop rock single. It was first sung by Gloria Jones. The lyrics are about leaving a relationship due to being abused. The song was first released in May 1965. In 1981, Soft Cell covered the song. Their version hit #1 on some charts. In summer 1982, it reached #8 on the Billboard Hot 100. There are many versions of the song. It has been covered by many musicians. ==References== Category:Pop songs Category:1965 songs Category:Marilyn Manson songs Category:The Pussycat Dolls songs
title: Tainted Love
